PMSI MCO Requête

Note

Depending on learner questions - the exact timing is subject to change.

Programme Journée 1

Time Activity
09:00 - 10:30 Module “Les essentiels”
10:30 - 11:00 Pause - Echanges
11:00 - 12:30 Authoring with Markdown and more
12:30 - 13:30 Pause méridienne
13:30 - 15:00 Computation and Editors
15:00 - 15:30 Coffee break
15:30 - 17:00 Static reports and documents
